result.description:
This is a sample test suite to test Knowledge Management application – In order to modify sample test suite make a copy of it.
The test suite covers below use cases:
- Create a KCS article from Case
- Create KCS Template Article with Approval Publish workflow
- Create MultiVersioned standard Article with approval publish workflow
- User criteria covering canRead and canContribute for KnowledgeBase and canRead at Article level
- Article level subscription
- Requestor performs search, view the article and provide feedback (Helpful No with Feedback Task)
- Create a checklist, assign to KB and perform AQI.
- Create and edit an article from Feedback Task form.
- Knowledge base level subscriptions
- Search for pinned articles and check if the click rank is captured correctly
- Create an Ownership Group and check edit permissions and subscriptions
- Create, search and view knowledge articles with knowledge blocks
- Validate that a versioned article is created, published, checked out, and retired
- Verify the scheduled publish feature for knowledge articles
- Validate the Knowledge - Approval Publish workflow in Agent Workspace
result.name: KM: Knowledge Management
